definition: to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
to whirl about in the wind

sentences.english: The flying waving in the wind, turn the illusive Buddhism country into the vigorous world.
sentences.chinese: 飘舞的飞天，将梦幻佛国变成生机的世界。

sentences.english: You always gently flying in the mountains, is so close, cordial.
sentences.chinese: 你总是温柔地飘舞在山间，是那么亲近，亲切。

sentences.english: I am not sad, there is another happiness and joy of flutter in my heart.
sentences.chinese: 我不悲伤，心情里多了份快乐和飘舞的乐趣。

sentences.english: She sat beside the window, watching the falling leaves floating in the air.
sentences.chinese: 她坐在窗旁，看着纷纷落下的叶子在空中飘舞。

sentences.english: Colorful flags danced in the breeze.
because as you can see the leaves are turning and so.
sentences.chinese: 因为在户外，你能看到树叶在飘舞等等。

sentences.english: She slowly crossed through, leaving both ends of the paper fluttering behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她慢慢地冲过终点，纸带在她的身后飘舞。

sentences.english: Snow danced in the mid sky, light and graceful.
sentences.chinese: 雪在空中飘舞，明亮而优美。

sentences.english: Walking back down to the road, the leaves start to float again.
sentences.chinese: 在步行返回的路上，树叶有开始在风中飘舞。

sentences.english: The fallen leaves look like little boats dancing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 落叶看起来像小船在风中飘舞。

sentences.english: I wore a tie that day, and it was leaping this way and that in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 那天我带了领带，它在风中飘舞起来。

sentences.english: Yes, I can see it now, rainbow battle flagswaving over field of battle.
sentences.chinese: 我现在可以想见彩虹战旗在战场上飘舞。

sentences.english: A swirl of sparks rose to meet the snowflakes coming down.
sentences.chinese: 火星向上飞旋，雪花向下飘舞。

definition: to flutter/to dance in the breeze
(of a breeze) to make (hair, leaves, clothing etc) sway gently/to ruffle
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
to move as in a dance/to wave (some implement)/to flourish/(of eyes, hands etc) to dance/to flutter
to sway gently (as in the wind)/(of a flame) to flicker
to float down/to fall gently (snowflakes, leaves etc)
(of snow etc) to fill the sky
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
